subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson beat Clint Bowyer by 0.002 of a second to capture the Aaron’s 499. It was tied for the closest finish in Nascar Sprint Cup history.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson beat Clint Bowyer by 0.002 of a second to capture the Aaron’s 499. It was tied for the closest finish in Nascar Sprint Cup history.
